Class BarcodeFormatConfigurationBase

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for all barcode configurations.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BarcodeFormatConfigurationBase

        public BarcodeFormatConfigurationBase​(java.lang.String regexFilter,
                                      double minimumSizeScore,
                                      boolean addAdditionalQuietZone)
        Constructs BarcodeFormatConfigurationBase with the given params.
        Parameters:
        regexFilter - Regular expression filter for barcode text. If the barcode text does not match the regular expression, it will not be scanned. The default is an empty string (setting is turned off). Default is ""
        minimumSizeScore - Minimum acceptable value of a result BarcodeItem's sizeScore (between 0 and 1). Barcodes with a sizeScore less than this value will not be scanned. When set to 0, barcodes are returned no matter what their size is. Default is 0
        addAdditionalQuietZone - If true, we process the barcode scanning with an artificial quiet zone that we add to the input image. This flag should be used to scan sharp crops of a barcode. Default is false

      • BarcodeFormatConfigurationBase

        public BarcodeFormatConfigurationBase()
        Constructs BarcodeFormatConfigurationBase with default parameters.
